Articles.Content:
Like so many others, my forum account needed to be remade. However, I consider myself fortunate, since I only joined the forum very recently.

Anyway, I am a senior undergraduate student from Virginia, USA. I'm studying International Relations. I am a total space nerd, and grew up (like many others) wanting to be an astronaut. While my goals changed, I never stopped thinking space flight was cool. KSP totally brings out that 7 year-old who wanted an Apollo action figure for his birthday.
